3D_mesh_generator.title: 3D Mesh Generator
3D_mesh_generator.description: Creating 3d terrain and shapes utilizing noise functions to generate data and algorithms to generate the mesh out of the noise. Currently only uses simplex noise and marching cubes for the data and mesh respectively.

butterfly_classifier.title: Butterfly and Moth Classifier
butterfly_classifier.description: Practice project while learning to work with the fastai platform. Classifies around 100 different species of butterfly and moth.

probability_calculator.title: Probability Calculator
probability_calculator.description: A binomial probability calculator written in javascript. Made when I got bored of googling one everytime I needed to calculate the odds of something. The probability of obtaining x successes in n trials is given as $P_{x} = \binom{n}{x} p^x q^{n-x}$ where $\binom{n}{k} = \frac{n!}{k!(n-k)!}$

stock_predictor.title: Stock Value Predictor
stock_predictor.description: A final year machine learning project researched and created along with 3 other team members. We set about selecting a problem and were to research and implement a machine learning based solution.
